text: ClickTime | https://www.clicktime.com/company/jobs | San Francisco, CA (Onsite) | Full Time ABOUT US: We help businesses become more productive every day. We're a bootstrapped, profitable, 35-person company going through an exciting stage of growth. INTERVIEW PROCESS: Two phone interviews, a short practical component (e.g. writing exercise) that reflects future day-to-day work at ClickTime, in-person interview, reference checks. ROLES: Associate Business Analyst, QA Lead APPLY: https://www.clicktime.com/company/jobs Please email sdabby@clicktime.com with any questions!
